Quick search

marilib.processes.assembly module¶

Created on Thu Jan 24 23:22:21 2019 @author: DRUOT Thierry Changed name from “design.py” to “assembly.py” on 21:05:2019

marilib.processes.assembly.aircraft_initialize(aircraft, n_pax_ref, design_range, cruise_mach, propu_config, n_engine)[source]¶

Initialize a generic aircraft

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_aircraft_pre_design(aircraft)[source]¶

Solves the coupling carried by nacelle geometry only Do not perform tail area sizing

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_aircraft_statistical_pre_design(aircraft)[source]¶

Perform tail area sizing according to statistical rules on top of the coupling carried by nacelle geometry

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_aircraft_statistical_pre_design_2(aircraft)[source]¶

Solves the coupling carried by nacelle geometry on top of the statistical sizing of tail areas

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_geometrical_analysis(aircraft)[source]¶

Perform geometrical analysis Do not solve any coupling

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_handling_quality_analysis(aircraft)[source]¶

Compute CG limits from handling qualities point of view

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_hq0(aircraft)[source]¶

Perform hq based empennage sizing without updating characteristic masses MTOW, MLW & MZFW

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mass_breakdown(aircraft)[source]¶

Estimate mass and CGs of the airplane For burnable liquid fuel powered airplanes, takes MTOW, MZFW & MLW as input For battery powered airplanes, takes only MTOW as input

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mass_estimation(aircraft)[source]¶

Estimate mass and CGs of the airplane Takes MTOW as input but solves the coupling carried by MZFW and MLW

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mass_mission_adaptation(aircraft)[source]¶

Perform mass - mission adaptation and update mass and CGs Solve couplings carried by MTOW, MZFW and MLW

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mda(aircraft, mda_type, mda_allowed)[source]¶

Run the requested design sequence

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mda0(aircraft)[source]¶

Run the design sequence with statistical empennage sizing but without satisfying mass constraints

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mda1(aircraft)[source]¶

Run the design sequence with statistical empennage sizing and local mass constraints satisfaction (mass_constraint_1&2) but without mass-mission adaptation

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mda2(aircraft)[source]¶

Run the design sequence with mass-mission adaptation (mass_constraint_1,2&3) and statistical empennage sizing

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_mda3(aircraft)[source]¶

Run full MDA design with mass-mission adaptation (mass_constraint_1,2&3) and hq based empennage sizing

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_optim_crt(x_in, aircraft, crit_index, crit_ref, mda_type)[source]¶

Retreve criteria

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_optim_cst(x_in, aircraft, crit_index, crit_ref, mda_type)[source]¶

Retrieve constraints

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_optim_data(x_in, ac, crit_index, crit_ref, mda_type)[source]¶

Compute criterion and constraints

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_payload_range_analysis(aircraft)[source]¶

Compute Payload - Range diagram corner points

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_performance_analysis(aircraft)[source]¶

Compute operational performances

marilib.processes.assembly.eval_tail_statistical_sizing(aircraft)[source]¶

Perform tail area sizing according to statistical rules Do not manage the coupling carried by nacelle geometry

marilib.processes.assembly.explore_design_space(aircraft, res, step, mda_type, file)[source]¶
marilib.processes.assembly.mdf_process(aircraft, search_domain, criterion, mda_type)[source]¶

Compute criterion and constraints

marilib.processes.assembly.plot_mdf_process(aircraft, search_domain, criterion)[source]¶

Compute criterion and constraints
